about_the_game:
Void Soul Awakening is a challenging fast-paced rogue-lite shooter that immerses players in the tale of a banished Void Soul. You step into the ethereal "feet" of an immortal vessel, navigating the mysterious and perilous depths of the undead prison known as the "Abyssal Cube." The primary objective? Break free from this arcane confinement and unveil the enigmatic secrets concealed within the prison's dark recesses.

Your journey unfolds as you confront relentless waves of adversaries, each escalating in difficulty as you triumph over them in groups. The randomized levels and dungeon order ensure that every run is a unique and unpredictable experience, keeping players on the edge of their seats as they maneuver through the intricacies of the Abyssal Cube. Can you, as the Void Soul, overcome the formidable challenges ahead and emerge victorious from this otherworldly prison? The answer lies in your strategic prowess and determination to unravel the mysteries that shroud the Abyssal Cube.

FEATURES:
Hybrid gameplay of shooter and Hack & Slash




Adaptability:
  • As you venture forward, be prepared for constant surprises with randomized weapons and abilities coming your way. It's all about honing your skills to become the epitome of adaptability!

Challenging Bosses:
  • As you reach the finale of each dungeon, a powerful guardian stands ready, fueled by the singular goal of sending you back to your resting place. These formidable adversaries are unwavering, requiring you to thoroughly navigate the dungeon, enhance your strengths, and amp up your abilities before facing them head-on. It's a challenge that tests your resilience and strategic acumen against unrelenting foes who won't settle for anything less than your defeat.

short_description: Void Soul Awakening is a 3rd person action rogue-lite that fuses the heart-pounding elements of hack and slash mechanics with the intensity of a shooter. In a world of unrelenting action and adventure, you are casted as an immortal vessel struggling to escape from the clutches of an undead prison.
